name: Minificent
creator: Bálint
description: Adds colored lights to the game. They interact with stained glass.

settings.name: ScreenSize
settings.description: The size of the screen you want to be playing at. Check this using the F3 screen, it should say something like "Display: <width> x <height>". Write these values below.

name: Lower Clouds
creator: fayer3
description: Changes the cloud height, can be lowered or raised

settings.name: CLOUD_HEIGHT
settings.description: The height at which the clouds will be, clouds will start 2 blocks below this value.

settings.name: SWAYING_MULTIPLIER
settings.description: The speed the lanterns are swaying at. This is a multiplier on the default value.

settings.name: SWAYING_AMOUNT_MULTIPLIER
settings.description: The amount the lamps sway from side to side. Larger values will result in larger offsets. Doesn't affect the speed.
